content:
Hi, in reference to https://github.com/zulip/zulip/issues/21756#issuecomment-1098745715, is anyone aware of any issues upgrading from 3.x (3.4 specifically), directly to 5.x?
Thank you.

@ebecaf no; you should follow our standard upgrade instructions which have a few upgrade notes (configuration updates you may want to do, etc.).

See also https://zulip.readthedocs.io/en/latest/production/upgrade-or-modify.html#upgrading-the-operating-system in case you need to upgrade the OS.
We have a policy of fixing every upgrade issue that gets reported, so generally there's no known upgrade issues in steady state.
